name: Death Battlefield
description: Thrill-seeking aliens kidnapped humans and other creatures from all over the galaxy to participate in a TV reality show: Death Arena. You will play as the leader of ceremony, a sort of diabolical bat, and will have to regale the audience by eliminating all your opponents. This side-scrolling shooter features multiple upgrades, 20 levels, 6 bonus bosses and an endless mode. Have fun!
